alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area; Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 20 at 10:34PM AKST until February 23 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 8 inches possible. * WHERE...Northeast and Eastern Gulf Coast including Yakutat, Pelican, and Elfin Cove. * WHEN...From late Monday night through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow is expected to overspread the region from the west late Monday night through Tuesday. A slow warm up is possible during the day Tuesday which could change snow over to rain at sea level. Low confidence in the exact snowfall amounts and timing of the transition to rain.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
